title: Geelong
creator_credit: John Porter and Eric Porter Productions
brief_description: On the shores of Corio Bay, 45 miles from Melbourne, the great factories of Geelong beat out a productive rhythm. People flock to the beach resorts of Torquay, Anglesea and Lorne; from Australian Rules to the Great Ocean Road, this film acts as a brochure to Victoria’s second largest city.
